inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: acute or chronic conditions that would preclude surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cancers with high risk of ovarian metastasis such as leukemia and non-Hodgkin lymphoma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known positive bone marrow for leukemia or solid tumor
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: tumor in an organ that communicates with the peritoneum and peritoneal sampling at time of primary excision shows evidence of disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients older than 40 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH without estrogen therapy. She has short stature, delayed in puberty and developmental delay.
